live_updates: Services in the area have been restored. Thank you for your patience.

37095.summary: Some customers in the Oliver area of Edmonton are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37095.title: May 4 – Edmonton (Oliver) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: This issue has been resolved, Thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Our teams are looking into it. We estimate your service will be restored by 10:00am, Please stay tuned for updates.
37081.summary: Some customers in the Dalhousie area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37081.title: May 4 – Calgary (Dalhousie) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
